'''''Descending Into the Depths of Desolation''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Blessed Hamada]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in the following areas in Sumeru: [[Gavireh Lajavard]] and [[Realm of Farakhkert]].

The Teleport Waypoints which do not appear on the map can be found while completing {{Quest|Khvarena of Good and Evil}}.
